subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Houston Rockets became the third team in N.B.A. history to win 20 consecutive games Wednesday, tying for the league’s second-longest winning streak with an 83-75 victory over the Hawks in Atlanta.
snippet: The Houston Rockets became the third team in N.B.A. history to win 20 consecutive games Wednesday, tying for the league’s second-longest winning streak with an 83-75 victory over the Hawks in Atlanta.
